lines:
1956

2000 24 
98576

B

Twan

Emperial Medical College,

19e

Tentin, g4 April 
Alfred. S. Maurus house

Your Kind leker dadd the 5th of March 
1912 eucling Matement of accruck of hyton SS Kevan 
has reached me today, and I harten U apologing for 
my thortaguige ni We delay fmy sencillanée which 
dught to have been sent lyri fórne mouth ago, try and 
warto have started for turerii five works ago,ad 
hastage was secured or board The As.Chia de proceeded 
asfar as to Skaughai where the stra of the Revobitur 
has caused his soppage, and he went 6 Hongkong tawaii 
for further developemeti my family anddelp had to leave 
for Houghoug, and had the calamit a witnessing the death 
of niy old father. Your other lettera did not beach me at 
all Oexcept the one dated the otkhach and n flikely has

got astrayed somewhere ou account of the conditiis jythe's 
C lry. However, I hope you will éxcuse me for my delay 
and il terut you much for the Kuid consideratin you have 
extended on alaruch guy ons affairs. I have just selurad 
from the south about alleek ago, and yorut Kind wishes 
for the future gehia a highly appreciated Enclosed please 
fund two draft for the min o #100024 gold, and for which 
Gore Kuid ackledgment will be expected by

Yours Mist Areireles 
l Hiwan,

Maurus house Your Kind leker dadd the 5th of March 1912 eucling Matement of accruck of hyton SS Kevan has reached me today, and I harten U apologing for my thortaguige ni We delay fmy sencillanée which dught to have been sent lyri fórne mouth ago, try and warto have started for turerii five works ago,ad hastage was secured or board The As.Chia de proceeded asfar as to Skaughai where the stra of the Revobitur has caused his soppage, and he went 6 Hongkong tawaii for further developemeti my family anddelp had to leave for Houghoug, and had the calamit a witnessing the death of niy old father. Your other lettera did not beach me at all Oexcept the one dated the otkhach and n flikely has got astrayed somewhere ou account of the conditiis jythe's C lry. However, I hope you will éxcuse me for my delay and il terut you much for the Kuid consideratin you have extended on alaruch guy ons affairs. I have just selurad from the south about alleek ago, and yorut Kind wishes for the future gehia a highly appreciated Enclosed please fund two draft for the min o #100024 gold, and for which Gore Kuid ackledgment will be expected by Yours Mist Areireles l Hiwan,

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter acknowledging the account statement sent by the Academy and apologizing for delayed remittance. He describes the reasons for the delay in his son's arrival due to the strain of the Revolution. He apologizes for the delays in receipt of mail and encloses a draft for $1000.24 to settle the account.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
